attributes.action: Stop the project to build the Stonehenge Tunnel.
attributes.additional_details: Stonehenge is an ancient sacred site, this tunnel is a complete desecration. Further archaeology yet to be discovered will also be destroyed.
attributes.background: Stonehenge is a world heritage site. The UK Government plans to move the A303 road by building a tunnel under the Stonehenge World Heritage Site. Groups such as UNESCO and the Stonehenge Alliance campaign group think this will put Stonehenge at risk. So let's stop the UK Government's project.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop the road tunnel at Stonehenge as recommended by the planning inspector.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560496
